alert.note: Alert for Concho; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 29 at 11:38PM CDT until March 30 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL TOM GREEN AND NORTHERN CONCHO COUNTIES... At 1138 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Paint Rock, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Paint Rock around 1145 PM CDT. Ivie Reservoir Near Concho Park Marina around 1210 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Vick, The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1929 And Ranch Road 2134, The Intersection Of Us-83 And Ranch Road 765, Us-83 Near The Concho- Runnels County Line, The Intersection Of Us- 83 And Ranch Road 1929 and The Intersection Of Ranch Road 380 And Ranch Road 381. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
